General.Name: Alltek Technology Corp
General.Description: Alltek Technology Corporation operates as a communication components distributor and solution provider in Taiwan and internationally. It offers telecommunications equipment and computer peripherals; and trades in electronic components and test equipment. The company trades in, imports, and exports radio equipment; and acts as an agent for the products and tendering business of domestic and foreign manufacturers. In addition, it designs, manufactures, and sells AIS products and lighting equipment. Its products are used in data communication, wireless, optical communication, cloud computing, IoT, edge AI, power, and vehicle electrification applications. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 360, Ruei Guang Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 114
